data.eml:eml: Supplement to the Checklist of water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) from the Balkan peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Bańkowska, Aleksandra, Goldschmidt, Tom, Grabowski, Michał, Michoński, Grzegorz, Zawal, Andrzej (2018): Supplement to the Checklist of water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) from the Balkan peninsula. Zootaxa 4394 (2): 151-184, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4394.2.1
